title: How to Make Apricot Fudge

steps.headline: Line the baking pan with baking paper.
In a medium saucepan, add the butter, sugar and condense milk.
Remove from the heat.
steps.description: Add the chopped apricots and the crushed biscuits.

steps.headline: Mix the ingredients together thoroughly.
steps.description: Once mixed, press the mixture into the baking pan.

steps.headline: Place in the fridge to set.
steps.description: Keep stored in the fridge in an airtight container.

text: Line the baking pan with baking paper.  In a medium saucepan, add the butter, sugar and condense milk. Melt over a gentle heat. Remove from the heat. Add the chopped apricots and the crushed biscuits. Mix the ingredients together thoroughly. Once mixed, press the mixture into the baking pan. Sprinkle with coconut. Cut into squares. Place in the fridge to set. Keep stored in the fridge in an airtight container.
